attributes.action: Reform and properly fund mental health services
attributes.additional_details:
Pledge more funding for mental health services in the upcoming budget.

Educate general nurses and doctors on mental health.

Educate the public more on mental health. 

Make a&e a truly safe place for people in a mental health crisis.

Reconsider elements of the mental health act.

Open more 136 suites around Britain.

Create more NHS beds opposed to sending people to the priory.

Improve local services
attributes.background: Properly fund mental health services. Look into statistics around mental health and consider appropriate measures or law changes to fix existing ssues

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We understand you want reforms and improvements to elements of mental health services, but we're not sure what specific changes you'd like to see happen or what actions you'd like the Government or Parliament to take to achieve this.

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313

Continue Government funding for national mental health campaigns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562359

Fund a national awareness campaign for mental health in schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553711
